1. NABL Accreditation (ISO/IEC 17025)
Voxtur Bio Ltd holds NABL Accreditation, which certifies the technical competence and quality of its testing and calibration laboratories. This accreditation ensures accurate, reliable, and globally recognized results.

2. ISO 9001:2015 Certification
Voxtur Bio complies with ISO 9001:2015, the international standard for Quality Management Systems (QMS). This demonstrates the company's commitment to consistently providing high-quality products and services that meet customer and regulatory requirements.

3. ISO 13485 Certification
The ISO 13485 Certification highlights Voxtur Bio’s compliance with global standards for the quality and safety of medical devices. It ensures all processes meet stringent regulatory and customer requirements.

4. GLP Certification (Good Laboratory Practices)
Voxtur Bio follows GLP Standards to ensure the reliability, integrity, and reproducibility of laboratory research and testing. This certification reinforces trust in the quality and accuracy of test results.

5. CDSCO Registration
Voxtur Bio is recognized by the Central Drugs Standard Control Organization (CDSCO), India’s apex regulatory body for pharmaceuticals and medical devices. This validates the safety, quality, and efficacy of its products for the healthcare sector.

6. DSIR Recognition
The Department of Scientific and Industrial Research (DSIR) recognizes Voxtur Bio's in-house Research & Development unit for innovation and technological advancements, driving impactful contributions to healthcare and diagnostics.
